name: Nefertum Parfums
description: Nefertum Parfums is a luxury perfume house inspired by the ancient Egyptian god of fragrance and healing, Nefertum. Founded by perfumer and artist Adélaïde de Vignon, the brand focuses on creating unique, high-quality fragrances that evoke the beauty and mystique of ancient Egypt. Each scent is designed to tell a story, drawing on traditional perfumery techniques combined with modern artistry. Nefertum Parfums emphasizes sustainability and natural ingredients, making their offerings appealing to environmentally conscious consumers.

Nejma focuses on high-quality ingredients and craftsmanship, resulting in exclusive fragrances that evoke emotions and memories. Known for its innovative approach, Nelly Rodi blends creativity with marketing expertise to cultivate unique olfactory experiences and valuable industry insights. name: Nine West
description: Nine West is a well-known American fashion retailer and brand, primarily recognized for its stylish footwear, handbags, and accessories. Founded in 1978, Nine West evolved into a diverse lifestyle brand that includes a range of products including fragrances. The company specializes in appealing to a youthful and fashion-conscious demographic, emphasizing modern designs and contemporary styles that resonate with everyday consumers. Their perfumes often reflect the brand's trendy identity and are aimed at women seeking affordable luxury in their fragrance choices.

name: Nino Amaddeo
description: Nino Amaddeo is a luxurious perfume company known for its unique and artisanal approach to fragrance creation. Founded by Nino Amaddeo, the brand focuses on creating high-quality scents that evoke emotions and memories. The company emphasizes the use of rare and exquisite raw materials sourced from around the world, resulting in distinctive fragrances that cater to discerning customers. With a commitment to craftsmanship and innovation, Nino Amaddeo has carved out a niche in the fragrance market, appealing to individuals seeking personalized and exclusive perfumes.

name: Nintendo
description: Nintendo is primarily known as a video game developer and publisher, famous for iconic franchises such as Mario, Zelda, and Pokémon. They are not traditionally recognized as a perfume company and have not released any fragrance lines.

name: Niona
description: Niona is a contemporary perfume company known for crafting unique and diverse scent profiles that appeal to a modern demographic. The brand prides itself on combining traditional perfumery techniques with innovative approaches, ensuring that each fragrance tells a story and evokes emotion. Established with a vision to redefine personal scent, Niona focuses on creating high-quality, accessible fragrances that resonate with individual identities and lifestyles. Their collections often emphasize natural ingredients and sustainability, appealing to environmentally conscious consumers.

name: Nishane
description: Nishane is a niche fragrance house established in Istanbul, Turkey, that specializes in creating high-quality, artisanal perfumes. Founded by Mert Güzel and Murat Katran, Nishane aims to celebrate the rich culture and history of Turkey through its unique scent compositions. The brand is known for its bold, luxurious fragrances and meticulous craftsmanship, making it a favorite among fragrance enthusiasts. Each perfume is designed to evoke emotions and memories, often inspired by different themes, elements of nature, and art.

name: Nissaba
description: Nissaba is a contemporary perfume company that specializes in creating unique and sophisticated fragrances inspired by ancient history and mythology. The brand focuses on using high-quality ingredients to craft perfumes that tell stories and evoke emotions, drawing on cultural heritage as a source of inspiration for its collections. Nissaba aims to provide a sensory experience that goes beyond scent, engaging customers with the narratives behind each fragrance.

name: Nissan
description: Nissan is primarily an automotive company known for manufacturing vehicles, including cars and trucks. While they have explored various product lines including fragrances under collaborative projects, their main focus remains in the automotive industry. As of my last data update, there is no significant perfume line or brand directly associated with Nissan as a standalone fragrance company.

name: Nissery
description: Nissery is a contemporary perfume company that focuses on creating unique, high-quality fragrances inspired by diverse cultural and artistic influences. The brand was founded by a team of passionate perfumers dedicated to crafting scents that tell a story and evoke emotions. They emphasize sustainable sourcing and the use of natural ingredients, providing products that appeal to the discerning customer seeking originality and depth in their fragrance choices.

name: Niven Morgan
description: Niven Morgan is a luxury fragrance company that specializes in creating high-quality, sophisticated perfumes inspired by the founder’s travels and experiences. The brand emphasizes artisanal craftsmanship and offers a range of products that includes personal fragrances, home fragrances, and scented body care items. Niven Morgan aims to deliver a unique olfactory experience through blending traditional techniques with contemporary aesthetics, providing customers with a lavish escape through scent.

name: No Fear
description: No Fear is a lifestyle brand that originally focused on extreme sports apparel. The transition into the fragrance sector has allowed No Fear to capture the essence of its adventurous spirit through unique scents that reflect their brand's ethos. The company caters primarily to a youthful audience, infusing each fragrance with a sense of energy and the thrill of the outdoors. Their specialties include fresh and invigorating scents that align with their extreme sports image.

name: No7 Beauty Company
description: No7 Beauty Company, part of Walgreens Boots Alliance, is known for offering a wide range of skincare, makeup, and fragrance products. Launched in 1935 in the UK, it has established itself as a trusted brand, particularly famous for its innovative skincare solutions that combine research and clinical testing. No7 Beauty aims to provide quality beauty products that cater to a variety of skin types and concerns, emphasizing the importance of effective formulations and inclusivity in their product range.

name: Nobel Industries
description: Nobel Industries is a fragrance company that specializes in creating high-quality perfumes and colognes. Originating from a passion for unique scents, the company focuses on blending traditional perfumery with modern techniques. Their offerings include signature fragrances as well as limited edition releases, catering to a wide range of preferences. Over the years, Nobel Industries has built a reputation for its commitment to sustainable sourcing of raw materials and innovative fragrance compositions.
address: 1234 Fragrance Lane, Suite 100, New York, NY 10001, USA

name: Nobile 1942
description: Nobile 1942 is an Italian niche perfume house that specializes in creating high-quality, artisanal fragrances. Founded by the Nobile family, the brand takes inspiration from Italy’s rich history, art, and culture, resulting in unique and sophisticated scents that evoke various emotions and memories. Their perfumes are characterized by their intricate composition, using rare and natural ingredients that reflect the essence of Italian heritage and craftsmanship.

name: Noble Royale
description: Noble Royale is a luxury perfume company that specializes in crafting high-quality, artisanal fragrances. Their story began with a passion for blending unique scents that evoke emotions and memories, appealing to a sophisticated clientele. The brand is known for its commitment to using natural ingredients and traditional techniques, ensuring that each scent tells a story of elegance and grandeur. Noble Royale aims to redefine luxury in the perfume industry by providing distinctive, bespoke fragrances that resonate with individuality.

name: Nobody’s Child
description: Nobody’s Child is an innovative fragrance brand that focuses on creating sustainable, high-quality perfumes. Founded on the principles of eco-consciousness and ethical sourcing, the company aims to minimize its environmental impact while providing unique and appealing scents. Their story is rooted in a passion for fragrance and a commitment to responsible practices, and they specialize in offering a range of perfumes that are cruelty-free and made with carefully chosen ingredients.

name: NoBs Alpha Male
description: NoBs Alpha Male is a fragrance company that specializes in creating bold and masculine scents tailored for men. The brand positions itself as a provider of high-quality perfumes that emphasize strength and confidence. Their products are designed to cater to the modern man who values self-expression through fragrance. The company was established to challenge the mainstream fragrance market by offering more robust and unique scent profiles, thus resonating with men seeking something distinct and empowering.

name: Nocibé
description: Nocibé is a French beauty retailer that specializes in cosmetics, skincare, and fragrances. Founded in 1984, the company has grown to become one of the leading beauty chains in France, providing a wide range of products from luxury brands to more affordable options. Nocibé is known for its commitment to customer service, offering personalized consultations and beauty advice to enhance the shopping experience. The company emphasizes the importance of beauty in everyday life and offers various exclusive brands and collaborations.

name: Nocturne Alchemy
description: Nocturne Alchemy is an independent perfume company specializing in artisanal fragrance creations. Founded by Alia B. in 2012, the brand focuses on intricate scent compositions that blend traditional perfume-making techniques with modern sensibilities. The company emphasizes the use of high-quality ingredients, offering a unique range of perfumes, oils, and body products inspired by nature, mythology, and the cosmos. Nocturne Alchemy is known for its creative and evocative scents, appealing to niche fragrance enthusiasts seeking something distinct and personal.

name: Noeme
description: Noeme is a luxury perfume company that specializes in creating niche fragrances inspired by the beauty of nature and emotions. Their products are known for their artistic approach to scent-making, focusing on high-quality ingredients and unique combinations that evoke memories and experiences. Founded by a team of fragrance enthusiasts, Noeme dedicates itself to blending tradition with innovation in the world of perfumery.

name: Noise
description: Noise is an innovative perfume company that focuses on crafting unique and captivating fragrances inspired by sound and music. Established with a vision to connect scent with auditory experiences, Noise aims to create olfactory sensations that resonate with the mood and emotions of the wearer. The company's specialty lies in blending uncommon ingredients to formulate distinctive scents that stand out in the perfume market.

name: Nomad Two Worlds Foundation
description: Nomad Two Worlds Foundation is a social enterprise that combines art, culture, and sustainable practices to create unique fragrances while supporting Indigenous communities in Australia. The company was founded by Australian artist and entrepreneur Andrew J. Murdock, with the aim of promoting cultural understanding and creating meaningful economic opportunities for Indigenous artists through the sale of their products. Their specialty lies in crafting exquisite fragrances inspired by the Australian landscape and heritage, with a commitment to environmental sustainability and social responsibility.

name: Nomaterra
description: Nomaterra is a niche fragrance company that focuses on creating unique and artisanal perfumes inspired by different locations and experiences. Founded by a group of fragrance enthusiasts, the brand emphasizes storytelling through scent, with each fragrance representing a specific place or memory. Their specialty lies in the use of high-quality ingredients and a commitment to craftsmanship, resulting in distinctive fragrances that evoke a sense of place.

name: Nomenclature
description: Nomenclature is a niche perfume company known for its unique approach to fragrance creation, emphasizing the art of storytelling through scent. Founded by industry veterans, the brand is focused on crafting fragrances that combine exquisite and rare ingredients with a conceptual narrative behind each scent. Their products often draw inspiration from historical geographical and cultural elements, making the fragrances not just olfactory experiences but storytelling pieces. The company positions itself within the niche market by catering to fragrance enthusiasts looking for something beyond mainstream offerings.

name: Noodé
description: Noodé is a contemporary perfume company known for its innovative and artistic approach to fragrance creation. It aims to redefine the perfume experience through unique compositions that blend art with scent, creating each fragrance as a storytelling medium. The brand focuses on sustainability and quality, using carefully sourced ingredients to craft its products. Established with a vision to break away from traditional fragrance conventions, Noodé emphasizes individuality and self-expression through scent.

name: Nooka
description: Nooka is a lifestyle brand that integrates design philosophy and innovation into various product categories, including watches, accessories, and fragrances. Founded by Matt Waldman in 2002, Nooka aims to transcend traditional fashion restraints, bridging art and utility while promoting ideas of individuality and self-expression through its unique product offerings, including signature scents.

name: NordicFeel
description: NordicFeel is a leading online retailer in the beauty and fragrance industry, specializing in a wide range of perfumes, skincare, and cosmetics from various brands. Established as a player in the Nordic region, the company has built a reputation for quality and diversity in beauty products, serving customers seeking premium and affordable options. NordicFeel aims to provide personalized shopping experiences and expert advice to guide consumers in their fragrance selections.

name: Nordstrom
description: Nordstrom is a leading American luxury department store chain that offers a wide range of products, including clothing, footwear, accessories, and beauty products, including perfumes. It was founded by John W. Nordstrom and Carl F. Wallin in 1901 as a shoe store in Seattle, Washington. Over the years, the company has transformed into a major retailer with a strong focus on customer service and exclusive brand offerings. Nordstrom is known for its upscale merchandise and has established strong partnerships with various perfume brands, providing a curated selection of fragrances to its customers.

name: Norell
description: Norell is an American perfume company known for its innovative fragrances and contributions to the world of scent since the mid-20th century. Founded by fashion designer Norman Norell, the brand gained recognition for its luxurious and sophisticated perfumes which reflect a blend of elegance and modernity. Norell’s perfumes, such as the iconic "Norell" launched in 1968, showcase the brand's specialty in creating chic and timeless fragrances rooted in the American fashion landscape. The company’s legacy continues to be influential in the perfume industry, with a focus on high-quality ingredients and craftsmanship.

name: Norfolk Lavender
description: Norfolk Lavender is a family-run business that specializes in the cultivation and distillation of lavender. Established in Norfolk, England, they focus on producing high-quality lavender products, including essential oils, herbal products, fragrances, and other lavender-infused items. Their story began with a passion for growing lavender, and they have since transformed into a popular destination for lavender enthusiasts, offering visitors a glimpse into the lavender farming process, along with a shop that showcases their wide range of products.
